title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Momentum is on your side when it comes to finances today. If you experienced a recent windfall, keep your money working for you through investments or savings. Luckily, you can make strides in the prosperity department even without a dramatic shift in your finances. Take proactive steps to increase your net worth, such as asking for a raise or searching for a new job. Build on your good fortunes regardless of your current cashflow because money only symbolizes a fraction of your true and growing value. Dr. Wayne Dyer wrote, Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
